about_the_game:
ABOUT THIS GAME

Serena ended up all alone in the middle of nowhere... in the dead of the night.
Can you get her home unmolested?

Story

From trying to escape an Alien abduction, bartering embarrassing stories from her past for a ride home, or getting trapped by a mad scientist, Serena finds herself in a series of new adventures. Still trying to find her way safely home, she has to make the right choices of who and what to trust.

The Season Pass

The three DLCs add multiple new decisions and choices to be made in order to help guide Serena back to the safety of her own home. Each one will have its own risks, rewards and endings. Adding many new paths to the original game content and lots and lots of brand new renders, the Season pass brings together the Galactic Detour, Storyteller, and Mad Scientist DLCs, all in one package.

What is a Season Pass

The classic Season Pass lets you buy all the included DLC at a discount and you will gain access to each DLC once it was released.

With this Season Pass you get access to the following DLC (as soon as it was released):
  • Galactic Detour (2021)
  • Storyteller (2022)
  • Mad Scientist (2024)

Features

  • You can replay any path and decision you discovered by selecting it on the Roadmap in the Extras menu.
  • Visit the Gallery in the Extras menu to check out all the scenes you unlocked during your gameplay. Can you find them all?
  • The text speed and auto delay can be adjusted in the Settings menu.
  • Use the Skip/Auto button in-game to automatically advance the dialogue without clicking each time or hold down CTRL for the same effect.

Disclaimer
All digital characters depicted in this game are 18+

content_descriptors.notes:
This game involves the depiction of graphic sexual events. The sexual content includes gender transformation and some (avoidable) non-consensual situations. If you are easily offended or of a delicate sensibility this game is not for you.

All digital characters depicted in this game are 18+

name: Midnight Ride - Season Pass

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2 core Intel/AMD
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GPU with 2GB or more
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 2 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 4 core Intel/AMD
  • Memory: 8192 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GPU with 4GB or more
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 MB available space

short_description: Adding many new paths to the original game content and lots and lots of brand new renders, the Season pass brings together the Galactic Detour, Storyteller, and Mad Scientist DLCs, all in one package.
